name: City Quest: A Point & Click Adventure
blurb: City Quest is a classic point & click adventure game with sharp wit and a clear love for its predecessors.

rewards.reward:
==============================
== EARLY BIRD - BUMPKIN TIER ==
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD   
==============================
Get a digital copy of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX for the low, low price of five American dollars when it releases. How can you resist such an amazing deal?!

==============================
======== BUMPKIN TIER ========
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD   
==============================
Ok, you resisted the amazing early bird deal. Congratulations on your superior willpower. Still, you can get a digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX for the slightly less low, low price of Eight Dollars!

==============================
========== EARLY BIRD =========
======= DISC JOCKEY TIER======= 
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD  
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN 
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
==============================
Not only will you get a digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX and a DRM-Free digital download of the soundtrack, but you'll also get your name on the credits screen. That's like, a huge honor, man. By the way, buy it early and you'll only pay fifteen dollars!

============================== 
======= DISC JOCKEY TIER ======
============================== 
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN
2. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
============================== 

Want the super awesome soundtrack? How about your name on the credits screen? Do you want to be famous?! Well, this tier may not make you all-the-way famous, but it'll get you started! By the way, you're also going to get a digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX!

============================== ========== NPC TIER =========== ============================== 
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~ 
4. BE A GENERIC NPC IN THE GAME
============================== 
For fifty dollars, you can be IN THE GAME. At this tier, you will be in the game as a generic character. We make no guarantees about who you will be cast as. It's entirely possible that you will be cast as something inappropriate. It's like an awesome gamble. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
By the way, you'll also get your name in the credits, a digital download of the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
NOTE: Just to be clear, this is a unique, limited tier. Later tiers will not get to be NPCs in the game. Since this is a limited tier, we are offering addons as a way for you to get some of the physical rewards. Simply add the indicated amount to your pledge, and you'll get the reward! (For example, pledge $75 and you'll get this tier, plus a poster).

~~~~~~~~~~~ADDONS~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
POSTER: Select this reward level, but add $15 to your pledge ($25 if you are international, please). 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
POSTER + T-SHIRT: Select this reward level, but add $35 to your pledge ($50 if you are international, please).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
POSTER + T-SHIRT + BOXED COPY: Select this reward level, but add $75 to your pledge ($90 if you are international).

==============================
===== ARTIST TIER (PHYSICAL) ====
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
4. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
============================== 
Aww yeah, it's time to get physical. For Sixty, we'll send you an 18"x24" (~46x61 cm) poster of the box art. In true 80s style, the box art does not represent the actual in-game graphics at all!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You'll also get your name in the credits, a DRM-Free digital download of the super awesome soundtrack,  and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

==============================
= LI'LEST BOXER TIER (PHYSICAL) =
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN 
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~ 
4. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~ ============================== 
Are you content being naked and without wall adornment, but still want to get a bit physical with us? Here's your chance! Get a boxed copy of the game without all that other stuff!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get your name in the credits, a DRM-Free digital download of the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

==============================
== NEVER NUDE TIER (PHYSICAL) ==
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN 
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~ 
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT  ============================== 
Have your nipples been getting hard reading this page? Does that bring you shame? If so, we’ve got a solution! This nice, thick T-shirt is (not) guaranteed to (probably) hide your erect nipples from the world!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get your name in the credits, a DRM-Free digital download of the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

==============================
==== TAILOR TIER (PHYSICAL) ==== ==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
4. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
5. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT    
============================== 

Are you tired of always being nude? We're not, but in case you are, we're going to give you something to cover your shame. At this tier, you will get a Kickstarter-exclusive T-Shirt to wear, the box art poster, your name in the credits, the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of the game for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

==============================
== GROWN-UP TIER (PHYSICAL) ==
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN 
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~ 
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~ ============================== 
Is your man (or woman) cave full of too much memorabilia? Don’t need a new poster, but still want a sexy T-shirt and a sweet boxed copy? This one’s for all of you! 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get your name in the credits, a DRM-Free digital download of the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

==============================
== THE NUDIST TIER (PHYSICAL) ==
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN 
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~ 
4. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~ 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~ ============================== 
Do you live in one of those awesome European countries where people never wear clothes? We assume those places exist, but we’re not entirely sure, we’ve never been there, but It sounds awesome. Maybe you just don’t like T-shirts. One of these reasons is way more awesome, but they’re both valid. This tier is for you.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get your name in the credits, a DRM-Free digital download of the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.

==============================
== BARE-KNUCKLE BOXER TIER ==
========= (PHYSICAL) =========
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN 
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~ 
4. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~ 
5. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
6. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~ ============================== 
Look! We lowered the price! You can now get all 3 of our fantastical physical products at a fraction of the price! That specific fraction 22/25... unless you’re international. I’m going to let you reduce that fraction yourselves. Just like the $125 tier, you'll get a T-shirt, a poster, and a boxed copy for $15 less!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get your name in the credits, a DRM-Free digital download of the super awesome soundtrack, and a DRM-Free digital download of City Quest for PC, MAC, or LINUX.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
NOTE ABOUT $125 TIER We can't change the description of the $125 tier now, but If you're curious, we're adding a few things to that tier to differentiate it from this one. That includes: An additional download of both the game and the soundtrack, and we'll also sign any of the physical rewards you want there.

============================== 
== FOXY BOXER TIER (PHYSICAL) ==
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. NAME ON THE CREDITS SCREEN
3. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
4. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
5. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
6. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~
============================== 
If you're anything like us, you still enjoy the feel of a physical copy. Ok, feel maybe isn't right. You enjoy the look of a boxed copy sitting on a shelf. We're making a limited run of physical media for the game.
The boxed copies are standard DVD cases with awesome double-sided box art. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
In addition to the boxed copy, you'll get one poster, one t-shirt, a DRM-Free digital download of the game for PC, MAC, or LINUX, and a DRM-Free digital download of the soundtrack.

==============================
== LADY/LAD OF THE NIGHT TIER ==
========== (PHYSICAL) ========= ============================== 
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
3. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~
6. ~SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS~~
7. ~~~~~WE'LL SIGN IT ALL~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~(IF YOU WANT US TO)~~~~~~ 
8. ~~~~~ BE AN NPC ON THE ~~~~~~
~~~~ "LADY/LAD OF THE NIGHT" ~~~
~~~~~~~~~~ STORYLINE ~~~~~~~~~
==============================  
Ever wonder what it's like to sell your body? Here you go! Sell your body digitally! You send us a picture of yourself, and we're going to make you a main character on the "Lady/Lad of the Night" storyline! You'll have unique dialogue, interactions with the player, and everything! 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You'll also get one boxed copy of the game, one poster, one t-shirt, a DRM-Free digital download of the game for PC, MAC, or LINUX, a DRM-Free digital download of the soundtrack, and special thanks in the credits!

============================== 
===== HOBO TIER (PHYSICAL) =====
==============================
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
3. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~
6. ~SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS~~
7. ~~~~~WE'LL SIGN IT ALL~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~(IF YOU WANT US TO)~~~~~~ 
8. ~~~~~ BE AN NPC ON THE ~~~~~~
~~~~~~~ "HOBO" STORYLINE ~~~~~
============================== 
I'm sure you've wondered what it's like to live carefree on the streets, no bills to pay or job to attend, right? Who hasn't?! Live that dream vicariously through the NPC we'll model in your image for the "Hobo" storyline! You'll have unique dialogue, interactions with the player, and everything! 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get one boxed copy of the game, one poster, one t-shirt, a DRM-Free digital download of the game for PC, MAC, or LINUX, a DRM-Free digital download of the soundtrack, and special thanks in the credits!

==============================
=== MAFIOSO TIER (PHYSICAL) ===
============================== 
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
3. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~
6. ~SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS~~
7. ~~~~~WE'LL SIGN IT ALL~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~(IF YOU WANT US TO)~~~~~~ 
8. ~~~~~ BE AN NPC ON THE ~~~~~~
~~~~~ "MAFIOSO" STORYLINE ~~~~
==============================   
Have you ever capped a guy? If so, don't tell us, we don't want to keep that secret. If you haven't, like most of the rest of the world, have an NPC of you do it instead! You'll send us a picture, and we'll pixelize it and give it unique dialogue and interactions on the "Mafioso" storyline.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You'll also get one boxed copy of the game, one poster, one t-shirt, a DRM-Free digital download of the game for PC, MAC, or LINUX, a DRM-Free digital download of the soundtrack, and special thanks in the credits!

==============================
== POLITICIAN TIER (PHYSICAL) ==
============================== 
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
3. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~
6. ~SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS~~
7. ~~~~~WE'LL SIGN IT ALL~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~(IF YOU WANT US TO)~~~~~~ 
8. ~~~~~ BE AN NPC ON THE ~~~~~~
~~~~ "POLITICIAN" STORYLINE ~~~~
==============================  
Like most of the world, you are aware that politicians exist. Here's the perfect way to live the glamorous life of a lawmaker, without all the campaigning! You send us a picture of yourself, and we'll transform you into a digital politician, complete with sleezy unique dialogue, and custom interactions for the "Politician" storyline.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You'll also get one boxed copy of the game, one poster, one t-shirt, a DRM-Free digital download of the game for PC, MAC, or LINUX, a DRM-Free digital download of the soundtrack, and special thanks in the credits!

==============================
==== KING OF THE CITY TIER =====
======= TIER (PHYSICAL) ========
============================== 
==== 5 OF EVERY ITEM BELOW ====
1. DRM-FREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 
2. ~~ SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD ~~
3. ~~ POSTER OF THE BOX ART ~~
4. KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE SHIRT 
5. ~A BOXED COPY OF THE GAME~
========= IN ADDITION =========
6. AN NPC ON THE STORYLINE OF 
~~~~~~~YOUR CHOICE ~~~~~~~~~~
7. ~~~WE'LL SIGN EVERYTHING ~~~
~~~~~~~~(IF YOU WANT)~~~~~~~~~
8. ~~~SUPER SPECIAL THANKS ~~~
~~~~ IN THE CREDITS SCREEN ~~~
==============================
Wow! You must really believe in this project. Or you have a lot of extra money and a wicked sense of humor. Or you've stolen lots of money and are laundering it through kickstarter somehow (we're not really sure how money laundering works). One way or another, you're awesome. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In return for your grand gesture, we'll give you 5 of everything (besides NPCs, you only get one. We only have room for so many)! We'll also give you super special thanks in the credits, way up near the top! 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In addition, we'll sign any of the physical stuff you want us to! This is entirely optional, so we'll leave it to you to tell us what you want!
